name: Oncology Cancer Screening Package
description: Comprehensive cancer screening protocols based on 2024 guidelines including expanded lung cancer screening and updated breast cancer recommendations

screening_types.name: Colorectal Cancer Screening - Colonoscopy
screening_types.description: Standard colonoscopy screening for colorectal cancer (average risk)

screening_types.name: Colorectal Cancer Screening - High Risk
screening_types.description: Enhanced colonoscopy screening for high-risk colorectal cancer patients

screening_types.name: Colorectal Cancer Screening - FIT
screening_types.description: Fecal immunochemical test for colorectal cancer screening

screening_types.name: Lung Cancer Screening - LDCT
screening_types.description: Low-dose CT screening for lung cancer (2024 expanded guidelines)

screening_types.name: Mammogram - Cancer Screening
screening_types.description: Breast cancer screening mammography (2024 USPSTF guidelines)

screening_types.name: Cervical Cancer Screening
screening_types.description: Primary HPV testing for cervical cancer screening

screening_types.name: Prostate Cancer Screening - PSA
screening_types.description: Prostate-specific antigen screening for prostate cancer

screening_types.name: Prostate Cancer Screening - High Risk
screening_types.description: Earlier PSA screening for high-risk prostate cancer patients

screening_types.name: Skin Cancer Screening
screening_types.description: Full-body skin examination for melanoma and skin cancer detection

screening_types.name: Genetic Cancer Risk Assessment
screening_types.description: Comprehensive genetic counseling and testing for hereditary cancer syndromes

screening_types.name: Ovarian Cancer Screening - High Risk
screening_types.description: CA-125 and transvaginal ultrasound for high-risk ovarian cancer screening

screening_types.name: Lynch Syndrome Screening
screening_types.description: Microsatellite instability testing and genetic assessment for Lynch syndrome
